name: Raising Student Voice - National STEM Competition
description: Annual national STEM competition for K-12 students to present innovative solutions to real-world problems. Students work in teams to develop projects addressing community challenges using STEM principles.
stem_fields: Science, Technology, Engineering, Mathematics, Innovation

name: Raising Student Voice - Youth Innovation Challenge
description: Competition focused on student-led innovation projects addressing climate change, sustainability, and environmental issues. Open to middle and high school students nationwide.
stem_fields: Environmental Science, Engineering, Sustainability, Technology

name: Raising Student Voice - Elementary STEM Showcase
description: Regional STEM showcase competition designed specifically for elementary students (K-5) to present science experiments, engineering projects, and mathematical discoveries.
stem_fields: Science, Engineering, Mathematics, Technology

name: Raising Student Voice - Coding Championship
description: National coding competition for middle and high school students featuring algorithm challenges, app development, and web design categories. All skill levels welcome.
stem_fields: Computer Science, Programming, Software Development, Web Design

name: Raising Student Voice - Robotics Design Competition
description: Team-based robotics competition where students design, build, and program robots to complete specific challenges. Includes beginner and advanced divisions.
stem_fields: Robotics, Engineering, Programming, Design

name: Raising Student Voice - Women in STEM Competition
description: Competition specifically designed to encourage and celebrate female students in STEM fields. Projects can span all STEM disciplines with focus on real-world applications.
stem_fields: All STEM Fields

name: Raising Student Voice - Math Olympiad Challenge
description: Multi-level mathematics competition featuring problem-solving challenges, mathematical modeling, and applied mathematics. Separate divisions for elementary, middle, and high school.
stem_fields: Mathematics, Applied Math, Problem Solving

name: Raising Student Voice - Science Fair Excellence
description: Traditional science fair competition with modern virtual presentation options. Students conduct original research and present findings across all science disciplines.
stem_fields: Biology, Chemistry, Physics, Environmental Science, Earth Science

name: Raising Student Voice - Engineering Design Challenge
description: Annual engineering design competition where students develop solutions to real-world engineering problems. Includes civil, mechanical, electrical, and environmental engineering categories.
stem_fields: Engineering, Design, Problem Solving, Applied Science

name: Raising Student Voice - AI and Machine Learning Challenge
description: Competition focused on artificial intelligence and machine learning projects for high school students. Students develop AI models to solve real-world problems.
stem_fields: Artificial Intelligence, Machine Learning, Computer Science, Data Science

name: Raising Student Voice - Environmental Solutions Competition
description: Competition challenging students to develop innovative solutions to environmental challenges including pollution, conservation, and climate change.
stem_fields: Environmental Science, Ecology, Sustainability, Engineering

name: Raising Student Voice - Data Science Challenge
description: Competition where students analyze real-world datasets to extract insights and create data visualizations. Appropriate for students learning statistics and data analysis.
stem_fields: Data Science, Statistics, Mathematics, Computer Science

name: Raising Student Voice - Biomedical Innovation Competition
description: Competition focused on biomedical engineering and health sciences. Students develop medical devices, health technologies, or biological research projects.
stem_fields: Biomedical Engineering, Biology, Health Sciences, Medical Technology

name: Raising Student Voice - Cybersecurity Challenge
description: High school cybersecurity competition covering ethical hacking, network security, cryptography, and digital forensics. Beginner-friendly with advanced categories.
stem_fields: Cybersecurity, Computer Science, Information Technology, Cryptography

name: Raising Student Voice - Space and Astronomy Challenge
description: Competition focused on space science, astronomy, and aerospace engineering. Students design missions, conduct astronomical observations, or build model rockets.
stem_fields: Astronomy, Aerospace Engineering, Physics, Space Science

name: Raising Student Voice - Mobile App Development Challenge
description: Competition where students design and develop mobile applications addressing social issues, education, health, or community needs.
stem_fields: Mobile Development, Computer Science, Software Engineering, UI/UX Design

name: Raising Student Voice - Chemistry Research Competition
description: Competition for original chemistry research projects including organic chemistry, biochemistry, analytical chemistry, and materials science.
stem_fields: Chemistry, Biochemistry, Materials Science, Analytical Chemistry

name: Raising Student Voice - 3D Design and Printing Challenge
description: Competition focused on 3D modeling and printing technology. Students design functional objects, artistic creations, or solutions to engineering problems.
stem_fields: Design, Engineering, Technology, Manufacturing

name: Raising Student Voice - Game Development Competition
description: Competition where students create educational or entertaining video games using various programming languages and game engines.
stem_fields: Computer Science, Programming, Game Design, Graphics

name: Raising Student Voice - Renewable Energy Challenge
description: Competition focused on renewable energy solutions including solar, wind, hydroelectric, and innovative sustainable energy technologies.
stem_fields: Renewable Energy, Engineering, Physics, Environmental Science

name: Raising Student Voice - Physics Problem Solving Competition
description: Competition testing physics knowledge and problem-solving skills through theoretical and experimental challenges. Multiple difficulty levels available.
stem_fields: Physics, Mathematics, Applied Science

name: Raising Student Voice - Agricultural Technology Challenge
description: Competition where students develop technological solutions for modern agriculture including precision farming, crop monitoring, and sustainable farming practices.
stem_fields: Agricultural Science, Technology, Engineering, Environmental Science

name: Raising Student Voice - Middle School STEM Expo
description: Annual STEM exposition specifically for middle school students (grades 6-8) showcasing projects across all STEM disciplines with emphasis on creativity and innovation.
stem_fields: All STEM Fields

name: Raising Student Voice - Biology Research Competition
description: Competition for original biology research including ecology, genetics, microbiology, botany, and zoology. Students conduct experiments and present findings.
stem_fields: Biology, Ecology, Genetics, Microbiology, Life Sciences

name: Raising Student Voice - Web Development Challenge
description: Competition where students design and develop websites or web applications with focus on functionality, design, accessibility, and social impact.
stem_fields: Web Development, Computer Science, Design, Programming

name: Raising Student Voice - Virtual Reality Innovation Challenge
description: Competition where students create virtual reality or augmented reality experiences for education, training, entertainment, or social good.
stem_fields: Virtual Reality, Augmented Reality, Computer Science, 3D Design

name: Raising Student Voice - Social Impact Tech Challenge
description: Competition where students develop technology solutions addressing social justice, equity, accessibility, or community improvement challenges.
stem_fields: Technology, Computer Science, Engineering, Social Innovation

name: Raising Student Voice - Nanotechnology Challenge
description: Advanced competition focused on nanotechnology research and applications. Students explore nanoscale science, materials, and engineering.
stem_fields: Nanotechnology, Materials Science, Chemistry, Physics, Engineering

name: Raising Student Voice - Statistics and Probability Challenge
description: Competition testing statistical analysis, probability theory, and real-world data interpretation. Includes individual and team categories.
stem_fields: Statistics, Mathematics, Data Analysis, Probability

name: Raising Student Voice - K-5 Young Innovators Challenge
description: Special competition designed for elementary students to explore basic STEM concepts through hands-on projects, simple experiments, and creative problem-solving.
stem_fields: Basic Science, Math, Engineering, Technology
